Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a spell that has "Spark" in its name from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and add it to your shields face down. Then shuffle your deck. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Chain Cascade (When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may discard any number of cards. For each card your discarded, choose a creature in the battle zone that has "blocker" and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each of your shields. It can't cost less than 1. ■ If you have 2 shields or less, this creature gets +4000 power and has "Blocker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, all your creatures in the battle zone that have "Holy Field" abilities get their ability until the end of your next turn. ■ At the end of each of your turns, untap all your {HOLY SOUL} creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

If you do, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. ■ Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it is tapped. ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {RELEASE} - Bolshack Dragon, the Temporal Blaze (When this creature would leave, flip this creature to its lower cost side instead.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may put one of your shields into your graveyard. If you do, you may destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 6000 or less. ■ Each turn, you may untap this creature the first time it is tapped. ■ While attacking, this creature gets +1000 power for each fire card in your graveyard. {TRIPLE BREAKER} {RELEASE} - Bolshack Dragon, the Temporal Blaze (When this creature would leave, flip this creature to its lower cost side instead.)

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Awaken—At the start of your turn, if you have 5 or more creatures in the battle zone, flip this creature to its higher cost side. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
Rules
Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Destroy one of your opponent’s creatures that has 3000 power or less. ■ Choose one of the following: ► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone: ► Put a fire psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each of your creatures in the battle zone get "speed attacker" until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever another creature is put into the battle zone, this turn, this creature gets +2000 power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MANA REBURST} 4 (You may summon this creature from your mana zone by paying 4.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature gets +1000 power for each of your other (Wild Soul) creatures in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone, put this creature into your mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {MANA REBURST} 2 (You may summon this creature from your mana zone by paying 2.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Choose one of the following. ► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone: ► Put a nature psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. ■ Choose one of the following. ► Put any number of psychic creatures that have total cost 5 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone: ► Put a nature psychic creature that costs 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ You may return a creature in your mana zone to your hand. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone tapped.

property.name: Rules
